languages.text: "То есть вы потеряли судно и кто-то должен решить вашу проблему?"
"So, you've lost a ship and you want someone else to solve your problem?"
languages.original_text: "То есть вы потеряли судно и кто-то должен решить вашу проблему?"

traits.locale_text: "So, you've lost a ship and you want someone else to solve your problem?"
"So, you've lost a ship and you want someone else to solve your problem?"
"So, you've lost a ship and you want someone else to solve your problem?"
"So, you've lost a ship and you want someone else to solve your problem?"
"So, you've lost a ship and you want someone else to solve your problem?"

languages.text: «De modo que ha perdido una nave y quiere que alguien le ayude a resolver su problema».
languages.original_text: "So, you've lost a ship and you want someone else to solve your problem?"

traits.locale_text: «De modo que ha perdido una nave y quiere que alguien le ayude a resolver su problema».

languages.text: “也就是说，你们弄丢了一艘船，现在打算让别人帮忙解决问题？”
languages.original_text: "So, you've lost a ship and you want someone else to solve your problem?"

traits.locale_text: “也就是说，你们弄丢了一艘船，现在打算让别人帮忙解决问题？”

languages.text: « Or donc, vous avez perdu un vaisseau et vous cherchez quelqu'un d'autre pour régler le problème à votre place ? »
languages.original_text: "So, you've lost a ship and you want someone else to solve your problem?"

traits.locale_text: « Or donc, vous avez perdu un vaisseau et vous cherchez quelqu'un d'autre pour régler le problème à votre place ? »

languages.text: 「つまり、船を失ったのに誰か他の人に問題を解決してもらおうとしているのか？」
languages.original_text: "So, you've lost a ship and you want someone else to solve your problem?"

traits.locale_text: 「つまり、船を失ったのに誰か他の人に問題を解決してもらおうとしているのか？」

languages.text: "Gemi kaybettiniz ve bir başkasının sorununuzu çözmesini istiyorsunuz, öyle mi?"
languages.original_text: "So, you've lost a ship and you want someone else to solve your problem?"

traits.locale_text: "Gemi kaybettiniz ve bir başkasının sorununuzu çözmesini istiyorsunuz, öyle mi?"

languages.text: "Ihr habt also ein Schiff verloren und sucht jemanden, der Euer Problem löst?"
languages.original_text: "So, you've lost a ship and you want someone else to solve your problem?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt also ein Schiff verloren und sucht jemanden, der Euer Problem löst?"
